# vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format32ABGR

**Case**

A 32-bit, ABGR pixel format with 8 bits per channel.

## Declaration

```swift
case format32ABGR
```

## RGBA and ARGB format constants

- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format16LE5551**: A little-endian 16-bit, RGBA pixel format with 5 bits per color channel and 1-bit alpha.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format32ARGB**: A 32-bit, ARGB pixel format with 8 bits per channel.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format32BGRA**: A 32-bit, BGRA pixel format with 8 bits per channel.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format32RGBA**: A 32-bit, RGBA pixel format with 8 bits per channel.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format64ARGB**: A 64-bit, ARGB pixel format with 8 bits per channel.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format64RGBAHalf**: A little-endian 64-bit, RGBA pixel format with 16 bits per channel.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format128RGBAFloat**: A little-endian 128-bit, RGBA pixel format with 32 bits per channel.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatARGB2101010LEPacked**: A little-endian ARGB2101010 full-range ARGB pixel format.
